profile.name: Branimir Karadžić
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Expert in Graphics Programming, Game Development, and Web Development
profile.summary: Highly skilled developer with a passion for creating innovative software solutions. Proficient in C++, Lua, and JavaScript, with expertise in graphics rendering, game development, and web development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
experience.company: Based on the provided information, I would recommend the following companies as potential employers for Branimir Kar
description: Designed and developed multiple software projects using bgfx and other graphics-related libraries.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software products on time.
Mentored junior developers and provided guidance on best practices for software development.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed multiple web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS.
Created custom game engines for various clients using C++ and Lua.
Provided technical support and maintenance services for existing software projects.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development of multiple open-source projects, including GENie and ImGuizmo.
Mentored other developers on contributing to open-source projects.
Ensured the stability and security of open-source projects.

experience.title: Student
